divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking back into my office and heard a humming and what sounded like a helicopter,then looked up and saw what seemed to be a helicopter following or escorting a black triangle craft, it was much to large to be just a helicopter. And shape was definitly a triangle. There were lights from the chopper, and triangle had several,red in color. It flew over my building in a SW direction in a pretty straight path, was in line for a landing at a local airport, but was at a very low altitude, less than 500 ft, and airport isint for miles. Im always observing the stars and have a clear view of sky. The object finally dissappeared over the building and was unable to see. was completly visable for about 2 mins.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in East Providence
There were no other sightings in East Providence on or around February 22nd 2013
